fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Craft (Night): Craft a gun. Any visitors will stop you from doing this successfully, but any Unseen can visit you (without using their ability) to guarantee that you are able to use your ability. You can have multiple guns at a time.
- Shoot (Night): Spend a gun to attack a player at night. If your target survives, keep the gun.
-Gift: At any time, give a gun to another player. There is no limit to how many times you can give a player a gun. They may, in turn, deal a Basic attack to a player. This is increased to Powerful if they are Unseen.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Gift is usable at day and night.
